mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_PERFECT_INFORMATION ( PERFECT_INFORMATION_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, COMPANY_TYPE, HOUSE_PROPERTY_ID, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_TIME, SIGN_IN_FUND, INDUSTRY_INVOLVED_ID, MAIN_PRODUCT, COMPANY_COVERAGE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, PROPERTY_TO_ACCESS, PROPERTY_TO_ACCESS_CONTACT, EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PERSON, EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NUMBER, IS_HIGH_NEW, HIGH_NEW_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_TIME, PATENT_TYPE_ID, PATENT_NUMBER, IS_UP_BAZAAR, UP_BAZAAR_TYPE_ID, HANG_BOARD_TIME, STOCK_CODE, NOTES, STATUS, CARTE_TIME
) VALUES (#{perfectInformation.perfectInformationId}, #{perfectInformation.houseInfoId},#{perfectInformation.customerId},#{perfectInformation.companyType}, #{perfectInformation.housePropertyId},#{perfectInformation.companyEstablishTime},#{perfectInformation.signInFund}, #{perfectInformation.industryInvolvedId},#{perfectInformation.mainProduct},#{perfectInformation.companyCoverageId}, #{perfectInformation.employeeNumber},#{perfectInformation.propertyToAccess},#{perfectInformation.propertyToAccessContact}, #{perfectInformation.emergencyContactPerson},#{perfectInformation.emergencyContactNumber},#{perfectInformation.isHighNew}, #{perfectInformation.highNewType},#{perfectInformation.certificateTime},#{perfectInformation.patentTypeId}, #{perfectInformation.patentNumber},#{perfectInformation.isUpBazaar},#{perfectInformation.upBazaarTypeId}, #{perfectInformation.hangBoardTime},#{perfectInformation.stockCode},#{perfectInformation.notes}, #{perfectInformation.status},#{perfectInformation.carteTime} )

INSERT INTO T_ENTER_MATERIAL (ENTER_MATERIAL_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, MATERIAL_NAME, MATERIAL_ADDRESS, BASIC_INFO, NOTES, CUSTOMER_ID) VALUES (#{enterMaterial.enterMaterialId},#{enterMaterial.houseInfoId},#{enterMaterial.materialName}, #{enterMaterial.materialAddress},#{enterMaterial.basicInfo},#{enterMaterial.notes}, #{enterMaterial.customerId})
